Package com.mycompany.datarose

Class CaseConversion

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.datarose.CaseConversion
public class CaseConversion extends Object
Class that is primarily intended to convert SQL and data identifiers between case types, e.g. camelCast to CONSTANT_CASE.
Author:
Jim

      public static String convertCase(String str, CaseType sourceCaseType, CaseType targetCaseType)
      Convert case converts the string using from a source case type to a target case type.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to convert
      sourceCaseType - The source case type from the CaseType enum.
      targetCaseType - The target case type from the CsaeType enum.
      Returns:
      The convertedStr string
      Since:
      1.0

    • convertCamelToTitle

      public static String convertCamelToTitle(String str)
      Convert case converts the string using from a source case type of camel to title. Pascal camel is PascalCamel while regular camel is regularCamel. Both are handled by this function.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to convert
      Returns:
      The convertedStr string
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      • None
